text: Athaba sihamte e'i katha kaya neki ye, â€˜e'ito te'om nije'i racana karaicheâ€™? Nahaya, baram eya tomara pratipalakara taraphara paraa aha satya, yate tumi enekuraa eta sampradayaka satarka karaiba paraa, yisakalara ocarata tomara purbe ana kono satarkakarai aha na'i, sambharata sihamte hidayata labha karaiba
